1.text: Mix warm water and dish soap in a small bowl.

2.text: Scrub the case with a clean toothbrush dipped in the soapy water.
2.vid: /d/d9/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Rinse the case off in clean water.
3.vid: /0/03/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Dry the case off with a clean towel.
4.vid: /3/3a/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Place the case on a countertop for 1 hour to air dry.
5.vid: /8/85/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Wash your phone case weekly to prevent stains from forming.

7.text: Dampen a clean microfiber cloth lightly in rubbing alcohol.
7.vid: /b/bc/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Scrub the stains on the case in a circle with the damp cloth.
8.vid: /c/c2/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Wipe the case dry with a clean microfiber cloth.
9.vid: /e/e9/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Wait about 1 hour for the case to air dry before putting it on your phone.

11.text: Sprinkle baking soda over the entire case.
11.vid: /4/4f/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: Scrub the phone case with a wet toothbrush.
12.vid: /c/c6/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Rinse the phone case off in clean water.
13.vid: /e/ee/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 13.360p.mp4

14.text: Wipe the case dry with a clean cloth.
14.vid: /e/e4/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 14.360p.mp4

15.text: Wash your case with soap and water if it still looks dirty.
15.vid: /e/ee/Keep a Clear Phone Case Clean Step 15.360p.mp4

16.text: Air dry the case for about 1 hour before using it again.
